title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 973.1 - Notification of intent to discontinue railroad service
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 973.1 - Notification of intent to discontinue railroad service

State Regulations

Every railroad company or corporation applying to the

Interstate Commerce Commission or any other Federal or State agency to
discontinue railroad service shall, within 30 days of the date of such
application, notify the Department of Transportation by mailing a copy of the
application, by certified mail--return receipt requested, to the Assistant

Commissioner for Regulatory Affairs, New York State Department of

Transportation, Building 5, State Office Campus, Albany, New York
12232. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
973.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
